title: Project: Grid Trading Bot
content:
## Ranging Markets

Grid trading profits from normal market noise in a sideways market. It requires no prediction of direction.

### Mechanism

1.  Define a range (e.g., $100 - $110).
2.  Place buy orders at $100, $102, $104...
3.  Place sell orders at $106, $108, $110...
4.  When a buy executes at $102, place a corresponding sell at $104 to lock in profit.

### Risk

If price leaves the range (trends strongly), you are left with "bag holding" (price drops) or missed opportunity (price skyrockets).
